bug_report.summary: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user.
bug_report.description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application.
bug_report.STR: <1>Login into the Application</1> <2>Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User</2> <3>Fill out all the user information fields</3> <4>Click on the "Save" button.</4> <5>Pay attention to an error page ORA1090 Exception: "Insert values Error.."</5> <6>See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)</6> <7>Also see the attached screenshot of the error page</7>
